attributes.action: Prohibit Border Force policy to turn back migrant boats
attributes.additional_details: BBC report 9 Sept 2021 that this policy is under consideration and training already happened to deploy this tactic. https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-58495948
attributes.background: Migrants, many of whom are fleeing persecution, undertake dangerous crossings by water, including across the English Channel. The great personal risk which they take must not be made worse by allowing a UK Border Force policy of turning boats back. We have an obligation to our fellow human being.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596718
